channel.title: Leaderships on Darshan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Leaderships on Darshan's Blog

item.title: Good Engineering Leader ?
item.description: If you are planning to become an Engineering leader or have already stepped in to being one, I am sure this is one questions that you will keep coming back to It is something that i have wondered / explored a lot about. Talking to leaders that i look up to, reading things online and a lot of analysis of how my journey has been. If i have to sum it up, I would say is the intersection of 3 things that defines how good an engineering leader you are going to be

item.title: If you can master only 1 skill
